column2: CBM Bancorp, Inc. is a bank holding company, which engages in the provision of financial services. The company is headquartered in Baltimore, Maryland and currently employs 43 full-time employees. The firm provides its services through its subsidiary, Chesapeake Bank of Maryland (the Bank). The company provides all services pertaining to chartered savings banks. The company provides residential mortgage loans, real estate loans, development loans, consumer loans and other commercial loans from funds attracted through retail deposits. The Bank provides its services from four banking offices at Parkville, Arbutus, Bel Air, and Pasadena.
